sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Flex, Button, Stack, Box, Input } from '@chakra-ui/core';

export default function Highscore(props: any) {
  const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
  return (
    <>
      <Flex width={['100%']} height={['100vh']} align="center" justify="center">
        <Flex align="center" justify="center">
          <Stack spacing={5}>
            <Box>Congratulations!</Box>
            <Box>You beat the high score!</Box>
            <Box>Do you want to add your username?</Box>
            <Flex align="center" justify="center" direction="row">
              <Box>{props.score}</Box>
              <Input
                autoFocus
                variant="unstyled"
                textAlign="center"
                fontSize="32px"
                type="number"
                value={username}
                onChange={(e: any) => setUsername(e.target.value)}
              />
              <Box>date</Box>
            </Flex>
            <Flex
              align="center"
              justify="center"
              direction="row"
              space="between"
            >
              <Button
                onClick={() => props.setView('play')}
                variantColor="blue"
                variant="outline"
                _hover={{ border: '1px solid blue' }}
                _focus={{ outline: 'none' }}
              >
                Save
              </Button>
              <Button
                onClick={() => props.setView('play')}
                variantColor="blue"
                variant="outline"
                _hover={{ border: '1px solid blue' }}
                _focus={{ outline: 'none' }}
              >
                Cancel
              </Button>
            </Flex>
          </Stack>
        </Flex>
      </Flex>
    </>
  );
}
